description: Theta series of (probably nonexistent) exceptionally good 16-dimensional sphere packing.
links: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups, Springer-Verlag, p. 190, Equation (47).
formula: Expansion of ( E_4(q) * 2 * (E_4(q^2) - E_4(q^4)) + E_4(q^2) * (32 * E_4(q^4) - 17 * E_4(q^2)) ) / 15 in powers of q. - _Michael Somos_, Nov 29 2007
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; a[n_] := Module[{A, A1, A2, A4}, A = x*O[x]^n; A1 = QP[x+ A]^8; A2 = QP[x^2+A]^8; A4 = QP[x^4+A]^8; SeriesCoefficient[(A1*(A2^6 + x^2*32*A2^3*A4^3 + x^4*4096*A4^6) + x^3*3840*A4^4*(A1^2*A4 + A2^3)) / (A1*A2^2*A4^2), n]]; a[0] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 30 2015, adapted from PARI *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
